channel.title: Boating on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Boating on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: A graphic designer named Gilda, Would take her boat out on the rilda. She’d paddle and row, Wherever she’d go, Spending the day out on the …
An interpreter went out a boating, He sang songs while his oar was afloat-ing. He thought it was fun, His boat in the sun, Til he tipped in, …
There was an architect afloat, On a boat he had charted and wrote. His designs were all seen With its sails bright and clean On a voyage to …
There once was a nurse who would float In a boat so she wouldn’t gloat Through the waves she did ride With the moon by her side And peace …

A writer with a heart so elate Took a boat out on the lake Filled with glee and in a trance He took a chance On the water to prance.

A truck driver out boating, Was quite the unceasing devoting, His boat was so wide He felt it a ride, A pleasure his motoring noting.

A technician who loved his boat, Designed one that he could float, For his task He’d no need to ask, He’d sail ‘round until he could gloat.
